sentences.en: A camel has a big hump on its back.
sentences.cn: 骆驼背上有个很大的驼峰.

sentences.en: At last I'm over the hump on my term paper.
sentences.cn: 我最终完成了期末论文最困难的一段

sentences.en: Camels rebuild fat stores in their hump.
sentences.cn: 骆驼在自己的驼峰内重新贮备了脂肪。

sentences.en: Fans just get the hump when they lose.
sentences.cn: 如果他们输了，球迷便会很恼火。

sentences.en: He really gives me the hump.
I've got the hump over what he said to me.
sentences.cn: 我为他对我说的话而感到恼火.

sentences.en: She gets the hump when people don't listen to her.
sentences.cn: 别人不听她的话时,她总是很生气.

sentences.en: Slowly passing under the hump - backed bridge, the boat entered the broad bosom of the lake.
sentences.cn: 船缓缓地从圆拱桥下面流过去了, 向着前面宽的地方流去.

sentences.en: The boys traversed a small hump - backed bridge to the opposite shore.
sentences.cn: 两个人便走上窄小的圆拱桥,到了对岸.

sentences.en: the dark hump of the mountain in the distance
sentences.cn: 远处高大的黑魆魆的山

sentences.en: The hump - backed man stared, as if in excess of amazement and indignation.
sentences.cn: 这位驼背人瞪出一双眼睛, 象是惊愕和气愤过了头.

sentences.en: The job wasn't easy but we are over the hump now.
sentences.cn: 这项工作不容易,但现在我们已渡过了困难阶段.

sentences.en: The path goes over a large hump by a tree before running near a road.
sentences.cn: 小道越过一处傍树的大圆丘，然后沿着一条大路向前延伸。

sentences.en: We're basically over the hump. We've got an economy that's likely to grow next year even more than it did in 1992.
sentences.cn: 我们基本上渡过了难关。我们明年的经济增长速度甚至可能会超过1992年。

sentences.en: When fresh food and water are not available, the camel can feed off its hump.
sentences.cn: 在得不到新鲜食物和水的时候, 骆驼可以消耗它肉峰内储存的脂肪维持生命.

words.tran_cn: 有瘤的；驼背的；有肉峰的
使隆起；使烦闷（hump的过去分词）
隆起；弓起；努力；急速行进

phrases.tran_cn: 度过难关：度过了最恶劣或最困难的时期或阶段

trans.tran_cn: （驼）峰，（人的）驼背，动物背部的隆肉，小土丘，圆岗，[铁路]驼峰调车场
trans.tran_en: a raised part on the back of a  camel

trans.tran_cn: 隆起；弓起；努力；急速行进
[俚语]使自己苦干，[俚语]快速地移动
使隆起，使烦恼，扛或背（某物），[粗俗用语][俚语]与（某人）性交
